md:
giải nghĩa từ "tape" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Tape (noun) - băng, cuộn băng
	+ Meaning: a long, narrow strip of flexible material, typically made of plastic or paper, used for recording or playing back sound or video.
	+ Example: "I need to buy a new tape for my cassette player."
	+ Related words: cassette, record, play, music
* Tape (verb) - dán, gắn
	+ Meaning: to attach or fasten something using adhesive tape.
	+ Example: "Can you tape this box shut for me?"
	+ Related words: glue, stick, attach, fix
* Tape (noun) - băng, dải
	+ Meaning: a narrow strip of fabric or other material used for measuring or marking something.
	+ Example: "The tailor used a tape measure to take my measurements."
	+ Related words: measure, ruler, scale, length

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible uses of the word "tape". The word can have different meanings and connotations depending on the context in which it is used.

  • Tape (noun) - băng, cuộn băng
    • Meaning: a long, narrow strip of flexible material, typically made of plastic or paper, used for recording or playing back sound or video.
    • Example: "I need to buy a new tape for my cassette player."
    • Related words: cassette, record, play, music
  • Tape (verb) - dán, gắn
    • Meaning: to attach or fasten something using adhesive tape.
    • Example: "Can you tape this box shut for me?"
    • Related words: glue, stick, attach, fix
  • Tape (noun) - băng, dải
    • Meaning: a narrow strip of fabric or other material used for measuring or marking something.
    • Example: "The tailor used a tape measure to take my measurements."
    • Related words: measure, ruler, scale, length

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible uses of the word "tape". The word can have different meanings and connotations depending on the context in which it is used.
